analyzed: omkāra utpanna śukla ābham madhya siṃhāsana sthitam
bodhyam tri mudrayā yuktam vairocana munim numaḥ
hūṃkāra utpanna nīla ābham pūrve gajāsana sthitam
bhū sparśa mudrayā yuktam akṣobhyam śrīghana numaḥ  /
trāṃkāra utpanna hema ābham dakṣiṇeśvam ārūḍham
vara da mudrayā yuktam namāmi ratnasaṃbhavam
jhiṅkāra utpanna rakta ābham paścime mayūrāsanam
dhyāna mūrti dharam nātham amita ābha munim numaḥ
khaṅkāra utpanna śyāma ābham uttare garuḍāsanam
abhaya mudrā saṃbaddham amogha siddhim namāmi aham

original: rocanā māmakī caiva pāṇḍarā tāraṇī tathā |
analyzed: rocanā māmakī ca eva pāṇḍarā tāraṇī tathā
brahma ādi koṇa saṃsthāḥ ca catuḥ devyaḥ namaḥ namaḥ
caitya madhya sthitam devam vajra sattvam numaḥ vayam
śrī buddha bhaṭṭārakasya vidyākṣara stotram samāptam
